start.state: Strip poker? I think this world's Pinkie Pie mentioned it once.
This situation will make for a very interesting friendship report.
We'll do everything by the book, and that will make this game officially fun.
Time to make a good first impression on my fellow players!

case.state: Is ~name~ volunteering to help me with my research?
Don't worry, I'm sure next hand will be better.
I really wish I had something to write down this process you call "stripping".
A clown? This Inventory has a very colorful cast, doesn't it? Pleasure to meet you, Joey.
Pinkie! You got my invitation after all huh?
This isn't the princess summit that I was expecting to attend today, but this seems like fun too!
It's nice to see someone else around here with a more common skin tone. I was starting to feel a bit weird with everyone else looking so similar.
Huh?
Don't shoot up! What if you hit a Pegasus?!
Just wondering... Do you think you could hit all of a player's clothing with one bullet?
Can I guess what you're going to go for next? I think the chest harness. It's squeezing your udders too tight.
You're so lucky...
Murder?! Hehe, you must have a really weird sense of humor... hehe... 'cause that was a joke, right?
Daphne, you remind me a lot of my friend Rarity... if she were interested in chasing monsters, of course.
Nice to meet you, Dawn! Our names are like opposites!
Woah, no need for the knives! He's just doing his job, after all...
No clothing? Well, I guess you can take off fur if you want, but how exactly are you going to do that?
Wait, what do you mean, "bye"? We still have a game to play!
Wait, what's that on your chest Florina? Is that a...
So I heard you can use magic in this world? You have to teach me sometime, because I can't seem to make it work here.
Are you going to use magic to strip now, Hermione?
I guess the mystery of who else is playing with us today won't last for much longer.
With those wings, I bet you are like a Breezie from my world!
Bless you!
You seem to be acting differently since you changed your hair color. Is there some kind of magic involved here?
Bless you! Again...
There we go. See, Moon? Patience does reward in the end!
You finally did it, Moon! Congratulations!
Of course you are supposed to be enjoying it! After all, we came here to have fun!
Oh no! Not this world's Pinkie too...
Oh boy... here we go again...
Rarity, you take every chance to make anything a fashion show, even a game like this!
Are you sure Rarity? I mean the Sweetie Belle of my world isn't exactly known for being too fashionable...
Saved the best for last? Now you got me interested.
Is it just me, or do our voices sound eerily similar, Raven?
I bet I can melt that mean facade with the magic of friendship!
You look a bit too nervous. You can always leave if you feel uncomfortable, you know?
You know, I had only heard ghost stories on Nightmare Night. I didn't know they were actually real.
So you are saying that people from far away can see what you are seeing with that little thing? I guess magic does exist in this world after all!
When I first came to this world, someone shared a video online of me making mistakes. You wouldn't do that, would you, Streaming-chan?
I heard you had some special abilities, Tracer, although I don't think I quite understood what they were...
I heard I had a twin in this world. It's nice to meet you, Twilight Sparkle!
Velma, you seem to have a lot of knowledge about this world. Maybe after the game you could help me understand this place a bit better?
Your skin tone doesn't seem natural for this world. Are you from Equestria like me?
And score one for Equestria!
I don't even know why male humans wear chest coverings, or the females either for that matter.
So do you males also wear these weird straps on your chest? No?
Trust me, you'll feel much better once you remove your ~clothing~.
Are you keeping your helmet all game?
Learn from this loss, and you will be better for the future.
Remember, the less you wear, the more comfortable you will feel!
Any clothes you take off will help you feel better, but the bigger the better!
Seems somepony changed a card she shouldn't have.
Don't worry, you can still win the next hand!
Do you mind if take a closer look at whatever you take off next in order to take notes?
Oh, I guess you don't have any Pegasi in this world.
You never know when a Pegasus might be above you. Right, Florina?
Wait, isn't this dangerous?
Awww, I'm actually going to miss your cardigan a bit...
That armor of yours looks really heavy.
Wow! You move so quickly, Lyn. Just don't force her if she doesn't want to go, through.
Ahh, it's a bee! Get it out of here, somepony!
Nice, I can't wait to see it!
Wait, are you just going to use your hands now?
Time to see that stick in action again.
I can't wait to see who's under there... Wait, it can't be... It's...
Oh no, that's terrible.
Oh! I didn't know we could bring friends here...

I'm sure I'll get used to it... eventually...
Interesting. It's much different than a stallion's.
I guess that size is appropriate for these type of bodies.

Something looks off... Are they supposed to be this hairy?
This will make for an incredible report. I wish I had something to write on though...
See? Doesn't it feel much better now?
Yes! Feel the breeze passing through. Isn't it great?
Feeling better now?
Do you mind if I take a closer look at whatever you take off next in order to take notes?
That's the spirit! Don't you feel a lot more comfortable now?

Hehe, your underwear looks like it was made out of disco balls. I like it!

The disguise worked... Although I don't know why you'd bring one to a strip poker game. It's in the name, after all...

Does that mean you also represent an element of harmony?
Purple hair and light purple underwear... All you need is a fully white skin and you'd look just like Rarity!
Yes! You look so much better now!
It's just as I say to my friend Fluttershy, you have to be brave!
And they definitely look cute!
What I remember Is how the rest of the girls kept screaming how I couldn't just remove my bra in the middle of the cafeteria with all the school watching...
Oh it's not as bad as I expected, I think I actually kinda like it!
Oh! Finally Rarity decided to show us her flank, but again, no cutie mark... strange...
You have a very pretty face. I don't know why you were trying to hide it!
Hey, does that underwear come with fur on the inside? I bet those must be more comfortable than the ones the portal gave me.

It's just like that type I accidentally caught Big Mac in heat! You won't try to mount me right here though, right?

By the way, I forgot to ask, what exactly are you a hybrid of? A cat with someone of this world? Or is it just a transformation like the one I do but with cat parts instead of pony parts?
So let me get this straight: You didn't bring any type of this "underwear" everyone seems to have?

Again, Harley, I don't think those are covering too much. I can already see your fur...
Do they like to go naked at Cheer Camp? Sounds like the stories I heard from Camp Everfree!

PINKIE?!

Whoa! Now there are two of you! Are you using the mirror pool to clone yourself?

I finally get to see some magic in action now. This piques my interests in so many ways...
I mean you can do it if you want, but please don't get close to me, I don't want to get infected with... whatever your reproductory system is infected with...
Hey, who is that person behind you, Morrigan? And where did she even come from?
Good game, Mika, but it seems you are out so... Wait, is that your friend coming over here again?
Great choice! I can't wait to see its magic in action.
That's some unfortunate timing. Sorry, Velma...
Show me how it's done!
Remember, I'll be watching everything you do. For science of course!
Well, ~name~, here is your chance to get comfortable.
I don't know why, but watching you undress is making me feel weird.
Seems your hand wasn't good enough this time.
You need to play better if you want to win, ~name~.
Oh, I see now. ~Name~ just wanted to get more comfortable before going on.
I may be out now, but that only gives me more freedom to watch you closely as you undress... to take notes of course...
Don't worry about me, I'm just taking a small break.
Awww, I don't know if it would had helped, but it sure looks cute.
I guess you aren't in mating season yet.
I'm going to have to correct a lot of notes before sending my report.
Hold your horses! Are you really that many points ahead?
I really lost hard didn't I?
So let me get this straight: You aren't a human and you're made of some kind of metal?
Wait, you still have more to remove? But you're already naked, aren't you?
I guess you won't be going all the way through with your helmet after all.
Oh, so that's what those hanging things were.
Please excuse me while I take some samples to later test its density, weight... and taste...
I can't hold on anymore... Please experiment inside my body next.
So you're done? But nothing happened... This world's technology confuses me sometimes...
By the way I'm sorry about before, thinking you were a female instead of... um... sorry!
Wow, glowing semen? Is that also a thing with having a "Trion" body?
I might need a bigger test subject to get more notes on female chests though, but don't take that the wrong way.
Hehe you look just like Rainbow Dash!
Those look so cute I could die... I mean, "Agh! So horrible, help please!"
But how am I supposed to study the female breasts if you hide them behind your hair?
You can use magic and you don't wear these uncomfortable bras everyone seems to have. I like you more and more each round!
Excellent, this is one of the best references I've found on a female human's breast. I do want to see how they react when they get touched... Maybe by me?
A pair like that could have helped me a few hands ago...
I know, right? I'm glad to hear that someone originally from this world also finds bras uncomfortable!
Good shot! You almost hit that little belt too, but I'm sure you'll get it next time.
Yeah... they still look like the same breasts...
Please, Elaine, just put the small man down... and your knife too... so we can continue the game.
Are we sure that was the only one? I think another one is close to me!
Well, it's not like that bra was covering much anyways.
Whoops! I guess the reason you felt so comfortable with your panties was because of how loose they were.
Nice! Seems Juri already came prepared and left her bra home. Wish I had done the same...
You have to teach me that spell! I want to try it next time I come to this world.
That's right, keep that spirit up! Seeing you happy makes me happy too!
On one hand... I'm glad you didn't hurt yourself... On the other... I'm pretty sure you should have gone back to normal by now...
I'm sorry I didn't mention this before, but your body is so well worked you might even give Bulk Biceps a run for his money!
You are beautiful, Saki. You should be really proud of yourself!
You were right not to wear extra restraints, Zone-tan. But maaaaybe you could have used the extra layer somewhere else.
Not only have I lost, but you are still taking off little stuff like ~clothing~. No fair!
Oh yeah! I had completely forgotten about that.
I wouldn't choose to remove those stockings before your bra, personally...
You're a pirate, right? Then you wouldn't happen to know Captain Celaeno, would you?
Even though the first time me and my friends met pirates, they tried to throw us overboard from their flying ship, they later helped us defeat the Storm King, so no hard feelings.
Aww, Florina is leaving so soon? Also I think she dropped something there...
Cannon? What do you mean? Like the one that fires projectiles?
Why would there be any chance of blood getting on your stockings anyways?
That diadem looks slightly similar to the crown I was looking for when I first came to this world.
Earthbending? That sounds like a really hard spell to pull off.
Wait a second... Did you just change your hair color? That's so awesome!
Excellent idea, keeping your camera will let you document this whole game. Those images could help me a lot with my research!
Huh? That's strange, the note doesn't seem to say anything about me, though. So I guess I'm good to go as I want?
I'm sorry about that note, Moon, but I'm sure you'll get more chances to remove your clothing, even if it has to be after the game is over.
Remember, Moon, slow but steady...
So why do you have those weird wings? Were you bitten by a vampire fruit bat?
WOAH! You can summon bats at will? That is so cool!
Who is this "webmaster" you speak of? Is he like a giant spider? Is that why you have to do what he says?
Don't worry everyone... My world's Pinkie has acted like this before... she'll be back to normal soon...
I gotta admit, I wasn't expecting them to look so... cute...
So do you travel in time or just move really quick?
Well, if you think that removing your boots is dumb, maybe you could remove something else like your bra!
I've heard you know something about a "Twilight Princess". Does that mean you already know me?
Took you long enough, huh?
What in the world...
A dress that also works as armor? Tell me more about this "mithril" material you mention.
A trump card, you say? Now you got me interested. I wonder what it could be...
Now that I think about it, I don't think I've ever seen any female royal guards in Equestria...
Awww, that suit of yours looked really cute, especially with that little bunny logo.
Two items for one hand? We can do that?
Make-up? Sorry, I don't think that really counts.
I mean, you could keep your mask if you wanted. There's way bigger stuff you could take off...
Oh, so it was another princess after all, huh? Nice to meet you. My name is Twilight Sparkle.
Wait, what exactly is a "Succubus"? Is that like some sort of underwear model?
Your hair changed color again! Does this have something to do with your sneezing?
I'm curious, Marinette: What are these things you call "Akumas"?
Oh are you transforming? Does that mean you are going to grow ears and wings?
That's the spirit! Get rid of that uncomfortable bra first!
Is everything alright back there Rarity?
No-Bra November you say? Sounds like a fun month!
Wait a second, are you saying you can't get too far from that thing or you'll disappear?
Wait, so are you taking off your skirt now?
Now that I think of it... Your eyes, they're grayed out... Oh no, don't tell me Tirek stole your strength!
Learn from this loss, and you will be better for the future.
Will you go for something big?
Remember, the less you wear, the more comfortable you will feel!
Don't worry, you can still win the next hand!
Seems someone changed a card he shouldn't have.
It doesn't matter how many times you lose a hand if you win in the end!
I think I understand now. You are taking off your smaller stuff first and then going up. I don't know why you would want to make yourself feel uncomfortable for longer, but to each their own.
It's fine. I came here to learn after all!
Oh my... And they say biology is boring...
That was certainly different... Do you think you can send a couple of vines to do the same to me? Without the whole being dropped on my head afterwards thing, of course...
Ahh, that scream... Either this body's ears are too sensitive or that was way too loud.
I loved how your ears kept twitching all the time... Now I want to do the same while I'm ponied up to see if my ears do that too...
That was pawsome! ... Yeah.. I'm not good at making puns... cat-related or otherwise...
You have a beautiful voice, Florina. You should join the Rainbooms!
Watching you hang up there doing that reminded me of the time Applejack used her rope to tie me in her barn and started... Sorry, I'm getting distracted here. Let's get back to the game.
Would you mind using that same spell on me once this game is over?
Thanks for that incredible show, Juri. Your body seems to have great flexibility!
Are you okay there, Korra? Your eyes went white for a moment.
Well, this must be awkward for you... Hmmm, welcome back?... And bless you...
Don't worry, Moon, I contacted Zecora while you were touching yourself. She should be here after the game, and we'll fix you up with one of her potions.
Was that what they call "using an assist"?
That play was incredible, Nagisa! Mind if I write to Celestia about it?
Your friendship really is magic!
That was amazing! You even had a magic aura around you when you climaxed. Really made me miss being back home...
This might be a bit too late to mention it, but I just noticed you could have used that collar to be in the game for another round.
That is going to be a lot of information to add to my reports. I'd also add what you were talking about if I had any clue what it all was.
A dancing masturbation, that's a first. For both my world and this world too.
That was great, Sola! I especially liked those magic sparkles when you were touching yourself.
With a show like that, I bet the people watching us must be very entertained!
That was quick indeed. But in a good way!
That fall looked like it hurt a bit! Are you okay, Ochako?
Maybe you should invite this "Twilight Princess" next game so I can meet her.
Well then? At least now that I'm out of the game I'll have more chance to take some notes.
Trust me. This will feel so good.
Oh no! I hope you didn't really hit a Pegasus this time...
Well, it's not like we haven't seen this before...
Just be careful there. You wouldn't want to cut the wrong thing...
Florina... You may not want to look, but the bee...
Oh are you going to use magic? I need to pay attention.
Yes! I knew wearing bras was a bad idea. Thanks for the confirmation, Mercy.
You look so happy now that you're finally being able to get comfortable, Moon.
Carreful Pinkie, you are going to end up hurting yourself!
It is so nice to be able to call a friend whenever you need help.
Nonsense! I have been waiting to finally see these all game!
I wish I knew about this No-Bra November thing before I came here. I wouldn't have brought my bra either.
So are you not wearing anything under your top?
Touching myself before must have triggered my heat. Now I just can't stop looking...
Ohhh ~name~... Don't stop... This is making me feel all warm again...
You look very... aroused... Do you need any help?
I wish you the best of luck for the rest of this game!
I guess you still feel comfortable with that.
Rarity would definitely like you.
Keep it up. You have all my support!
It doesn't matter how many times you lose a hand if you win in the end!
We still have a game to finish so let's go!
Am I allowed for me to take sides now that I'm out? If so, I hope you win this game, ~name~!
Oh, you missed your harness, Aimee.
I guess it's safe! You're a good shot, Aimee!
"Knights of Blood" sounds like a really weird name for a school, 'cause that is a school uniform right?
Is that your cutie mark? No? Why would you be wearing someone else's cutie mark on your clothes then?
So what are those markings on your legs. Are those like some sort of special long cutie mark?
Especially the hoodie. It was super cute!
If that one weighs as much as the one my brother used when he was a royal guard, then it must feel so good to finally take it off!
Hey, your outfit right now looks similar to what I wore at the Fall Formal Gala!
Oh no. Are you okay there, Florina?
Sorry I couldn't help you there... But I still remember the time a honeycomb fell on my head... It wasn't pretty... or painless...
Just leaving it halfway? But that's technically still not removing anything at all...
Oh I see now, you use that stick as if it were a horn to use magic, isn't that right?
Well I guess there's always the next round to see more magic in action...
I can't wait to get a stick of my own and use it on my body!
By Celestia! ... Wait, who am I kidding?... I don't even know anyone in this world, so I still don't know who you are. Sorry!
I think your panties are broken or something. They seem to be leaking some sort of liquid, Kurumu.
If you want, I could bring you to Equestria with me. I'm sure Princess Celestia will know a spell to heal your hands.
Did you just take off your socks using only your feet? I guess I could do it too after I get used to this body.
Oh, is that your cutie mark on your shirt, Marinette?
I bet you'd look super cute with only your hat left, Moon. But on the bright side, you can finally go for the bigger stuff...
I would have brought one of mine if I knew that!
It's nice to see you haven't changed a bit since the last time I saw you Rarity.
I see no problem with it.
I guess I'll just try to concentrate on the game instead. That should help.
Don't worry, redeeming villains is my and my friends' specialty!
Look out! You have a parasprite in your panties... Oh wait, that's just a drawing.
You have a friend that can talk to animals too? Maybe we should introduce them to each other sometime!
I get it... I think? Sorry, I'm still not used to the puns in this world.
I don't get it.
Oh I get it. Because these bodies have hands instead of hooves, right?
No way! Those things you call "feet" are way too weird for me!
I really could have used a peek like this a few moments ago.
Join me and feel the fresh air passing by your body!
But wait, if you are an "android" as you call it, does that mean that you come with... you know... the full anatomy?
Wait, was Corrin a male all this time? B-but the way he looks, a-and...
I knew it! That's why you were acting so weird.
Wait, did I say that out loud?
Why is there so many juices coming out of it? Did I do something wrong? It felt so right...
So many fluids... Did I break something?
It's so... sticky...
I'm gonna need to sit down for a while. Who knew that the human body could have such an intense orgasm?
Please tell me you caught that, Mahiru! It was amazing!
Uh... Please just ignore that, Pit...
Thanks so much, trainer. I couldn't have done this without you here today.
This was a fun game! I can't wait to try it next time Rarity makes some dresses for us back in Equestria!
Good job winning the game, ~name~! I had a fun time.
Congratulations, ~name~! We made some fun memories, didn't we?
Excellent start, but I still need to do more research on human anatomy. Care to join?
This was a great game. So, Mahiru, could you please lend me your camera so I can study the photos you took?
Good game, ~name~. That was fun! Oh, and look, here comes Zecora with the potion for Moon. Wait, why is she running away?!
Nothing would make me happier than to be your friend, Saki, and I can't wait to present you to the rest of the girls!
No, it can't be. It isn't true! I'll beat you next time, ~name~...

text.content: ~player~, do you have a moment?
You did really well in the game! Congratulations on winning!
I was just wondering...
Well, I'm new to this world, and I don't have anywhere to go home to yet...
I really love books, but they make for a lousy mattress. I don't want to have to sleep in the library again tonight.
If it's okay to ask, could I maybe sleep over at your house tonight?
Wow, nice house! Is it really okay if I stay with you tonight?
Don't get me wrong, I love spending all night learning, but my previous sleeping arrangements did leave a lot to be desired!
Actually... There's something I'd like to learn about that isn't in those books...
Everypony had to touch themselves at that game we played, and it was the first time I'd ever seen it done with human fingers.
But you didn't get to do it. I would have liked to have seen that...
I was wondering...
Maybe we could do an information exchange... You could find all about my human body with me, and in return I could learn what yours feels like...
And maybe I could see what it looks like when you pay the "penalty" for losing the card game?
When I did it, it felt really good!
Wow, our learning games are amazing! I feel a very special friendship forming!
I'll have to bring you to Equestria to meet the rest of my friends! How would you like to come with me and do some exploring?
Now let's get back to the fun! What did you want to show me next?

epilogue.title: Me, Herself and Her Other Self

text.content: (A few weeks after the game...)
Trust me, you are going to love the me of this dimension.
And don't worry, she might be a bit more shy than me, but I already talked to her about you and she agreed to do this. So there shouldn't be any problems!
Hey girls, could you lend me Twilight for a few minutes?
This place should be private enough. Glad you came, Twilight! This is the guy I talked to you about the other day.
I can't believe I agreed with you to do this. I have a boyfriend, you know?
Though I guess if someone knew how to convince me to do something this crazy, it would be myself.
Boyfriend? You mean that guy you have gone out with ONCE and never even speak of?
Forget about Timber.
Anyways, remember how I told you I got my own personal harem back in Equestria ever since I got my title of princess?
I think it's time for you to start your own one here. And I think ~name~ will be the perfect start!
Fine. Let's just take it slow, I don't have much experience with this... or rather any at all...
Are you seriously telling me you're still a virgin?
This is even worse than I thought!
Quick, ~name~! Take off your clothes! And Twilight, get down on your knees!
How are you feeling there, Twilight? Everything good?
It tastes a bit strange, but I think I like it...
Good, because we are barely starting here...
How am I going? Am I doing it right?
Guessing by the look on ~name~'s face, I think you're doing great!
This is it, Twilight! After this there will be no turning back. Are you ready?
Do it.
I want ~name~ to take my first time...
AHHH!
You've been there for a while now. Are you doing okay?
It hurt a bit at first, but now it's starting to feel good!
I'm so glad to hear that.
And ~name~, I hope you don't run out of stamina because I'll be waiting for you after you finish with her...
Just as good as I remembered you, ~name~! Oh yes!
I can feel him about to cum, Twilight! Come closer and get ready to receive it with me.
See Twilight, wasn't that great?
It was amazing, I can't wait to do it again sometime!
I better go back though, the rest of the girls must be starting to get worried about where I went...
You might want to clean yourself before going back...
Hehe, true. And ~name~, thank you so much for being so careful with me, I'm never going to forget this experience.
What about your boyfriend though?
Timber Spruce? Pff... He could go make love to a tree for all I care...
From now on, ~name~ is the only one I care for.
